info.summary:
Heng Tao Shen works as a Professor in School of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, and his\her h-index is 53, g-index is 98. His\Her interests are :
 Indexation; Indexing; Query Processing; Visualization; Binary Codes;
